news.title: Finding Fresh, Helpful Information Through Featured Snippets
news.description: A new Google algorithm update helps users find more pertinent information by distinguishing and prioritizing recent content in its featured snippets when timeliness matters.

news.title: Review Counts Matter More to Local Business Revenue Than Star Ratings, According to Study
news.description: A study examining over 200,000 U.S. small businesses in various industries found that a companyâ€™s number of online reviews was more important for revenue than average ratings.

news.title: New Research Shows Strong Link Between Google My Business Photo Quantity and Search Performance
news.description: A recent analysis shows a high correlation between the number of images on a Google My Business Listing and how many clicks, calls, direction requests the listing generates.

news.title: Are Google Mobile Searches Now 65% Of All Searches?
news.description: Unconfirmed reports indicate that mobile searches now constitute 65% of all searches, up from over 50% in 2015.

news.title: How to Get a Customer to Edit Their Negative Review
news.description: A new study has yielded some surprising insights regarding the way consumers relate to online business reviews, and what you can do to remedy a negative one.

news.title: Prepare to Say Goodbye to Average Position in Google Ads on September 30
news.description: At the end of this month, Google will begin winding down the average position metric in Google Ads, meaning that users must update any related reporting, rules, or scripts.
